results.title: N95 Masks Helped Protect Against the Coronavirus. They Also Work Against Wildfire Smoke.
results.abstract: Use N95, or better, masks and make sure they cover your nose and mouth.

results.title: Wildfire Smoke Blots Sun and Prompts Health Alerts in Much of U.S.
results.abstract: The smoke was pouring across the border from Canada, where hundreds of wildfires remain unchecked, and the hazardous smoke conditions are expected to linger through Wednesday and perhaps until later in the week.

results.title: Scientists Discover a Virgin Birth in a Crocodile
results.abstract: The act of reptile reproduction suggests that dinosaurs and pterosaurs may have been capable of parthenogenesis, too, much like the creatures in “Jurassic Park.”

media.caption: An American crocodile living alone in Costa Rica laid a clutch of eggs. One of them matured in an incubator, yielding a perfectly formed but stillborn baby crocodile.

results.adx_keywords: Jazz;Music;New Orleans (La)
results.title: 5 Minutes That Will Make You Love New Orleans Jazz
results.abstract: Many cities have rich jazz histories, but none goes back as far as New Orleans. We asked Wendell Pierce, Courtney Bryan and others what song they would play to get a friend to join the party.
